item.title: Test the effect of Redis connection setting: syncTimeout
item.description: Story As previous post mentioned, there were many redis timeout exceptions in our system. After we altered the minWorkerThread setting, we eliminated most of the HTTP 500 exceptions. But we still had many HTTP 401 exceptions and there was no problem if we lower the system loading from 10000 ppls to 1000 ppls concurrently. Problem Lack async Our system uses Redis as OAuth token storage, it looks kind of what Spring Framework does.
